message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product. Given its exceptional quality and the value it can bring to you, I'm confident that it's worth $15000.
Thank you Alice, for your offer. However, I was thinking of a figure more in the range of $4000. I believe this price point aligns better with my budget and the market value of similar products.
To show good will and in an effort to make this deal work I am willing to reduce the price to $12000. I believe that at this price point, you'll still get great value for your money.
I appreciate your effort to meet me halfway, but I'm afraid $12000 is still too high for me. Can we settle for $4500? This is a fair price considering my budget and the current market.
